data.eml:eml: Another new species of flightless Rail (Aves: Rallidae: Rallus) from Abaco, The Bahamas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Takano, Oona M., Steadman, David W. (2018): Another new species of flightless Rail (Aves: Rallidae: Rallus) from Abaco, The Bahamas. Zootaxa 4407 (3): 376-382, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4407.3.5
